programme.title: Closing Ceremony | London 2012 Replays
programme.desc: The ceremony was held on 12–13 August in the Olympic Stadium. It's also known as A Symphony of British Music.

programme.title: Vancouver 2010 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The Opening Ceremony of the 2010 Winter Olympics was held on February 12, 2010 at the BC Place Stadium in Vancouver.

programme.title: Vancouver 2010 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The Closing Ceremony of the 2010 Winter Olympics took place on February 28, 2010, at the BC Place Stadium in Vancouver.

programme.title: Beijing 2008 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony was held at the Bird's Next on Friday, 8 August 2008. It was directed by Chinese filmmaker Zhang Yimou.

programme.title: Torino 2006 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: Relive the opening ceremony held at the Stadio Olimpico in Turin on February 10th, 2006 and climaxed with the lighting of the Olympic Flame.

programme.title: Torino 2006 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: Relive the closing ceremony held at the Stadio Olimpico in Turin on February 26th, 2006.

programme.title: Athens 2004 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The opening ceremony was held on August 13, 2004 at the Olympic Stadium in Maroussi, Greece.

programme.title: Athens 2004 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony was held at the Athens Olympic Stadium on 29 August. Around 70,000 people gathered in the stadium.

programme.title: Salt Lake 2002 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place at the Rice-Eccles Olympic Stadium in Salt Lake City on 8 February 2002.

programme.title: Closing Ceremony | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: The 2018 Winter Olympics closing ceremony was held at the Pyeongchang Olympic Stadium on 25 February 2018.

programme.desc: A breathtaking showcase of Olympic gala exhibitions, celebrating the most iconic moments of athletic brilliance and artistic flair in a grand, unforgettable spectacle.

programme.title: Behind the Rings: Exploring Olympic Design
programme.desc: Go behind the rings to explore the incredible history and stories behind designing the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Anatomy of a rower and a figure skater
programme.desc: A double Olympic silver medalist rower and a French Figure Skater demonstrate their extraordinary strengths.

programme.title: Exhibition Gala - Figure Skating | Abertville 1992 Part 2 Replays

programme.title: The first Mexican Olympic figure skater in 30 years | Winter Tracks
programme.desc: When he competes in next Olympic Winter Games, Donovan Carrillo will be the first figure skater from Mexico to do so in 30 years. In a country with barely any Olympic size rinks, he is an artist who believes figure skating has given him the perfect platform to express himself. He moved away from his hometown and family when he was 13. Living with his coach, Gregorio Núñez, a father-like figure, to further his training. Together, they have overcome huge obstacles including lack of resources, funding and recent COVID restrictions to finally qualify for the Games.
